name: Springtide
description:
This is a demo of a game that I've been working on. It's still in the early stages of development, and I plan to add more to it in the near future. As of now, there are 18 levels in the game.

This is just a little something that I put together for fun. For now, it's just a demo which is still in development that I will continue to work on. Not long ago, I created another game similar to this one called YulePlat. It's nothing fancy, just a little something that I put together for fun and for others to enjoy. Like YulePlat, this game will eventually have gameplay options as well as added minigames. It's a platformer game that starts off easy and becomes more difficult with each level. I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did creating it. Please, enjoy!
